definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Germanic origin, derived from the elements 'ragin' (counsel) and 'wald' (rule), meaning 'ruler with counsel' or 'wise ruler'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自日耳曼语的男性名字，由 'ragin'（建议、智慧）和 'wald'（统治）组成，意为‘有智慧的统治者’或‘明断的领袖’。
definitions.example_en: Reginald was a respected historian who published several books on medieval Europe.
definitions.example_cn: 雷金纳德是一位受人尊敬的历史学家，出版了多本关于中世纪欧洲的著作。
